LanguageData.VQE_NewVault.label: Sealed Vault
LanguageData.VQE_NewVault.description: A memory drifts into your fractured mind as you stumble into a rusted chamber. An experiment, a group of doctors wearing abstract masks, and a flash of golden yellow light enveloping your body. You feel something deeply unnatural pulsing in your chest, you have been modified somehow and have been sleeping for a very long time. Your legs shake as you remember what this place is, a near impenetrable fortress capable of keeping rescue out and captives in. The vault contains an underground section guarded by a sealed door. After so many years, your captives appear long gone. The cold realization thuds onto your chest, what unknown force may have placed you back here?
LanguageData.VQE_NewVault.scenario.name: Sealed Vault
LanguageData.VQE_NewVault.scenario.summary: A long forgotten supersoldier guarding their post. A classic VQE - Ancients experience.
